tool_description: Constructs individual survey questions by combining question text, response types, rating scales, and validation rules into complete question objects.

question_text.description: The main question text to be displayed to respondents

question_type.description: Type of question: likert_scale, multiple_choice, yes_no, text_input, ranking, rating, or matrix

scale_id.description: Reference to rating scale (required for likert_scale, rating types)

response_options.description: Available response options for multiple_choice questions

is_required.description: Whether the question must be answered

help_text.description: Additional guidance or explanation for respondents

category.description: Question category for organization and analysis

error_messages: Invalid question type: Must be one of [likert_scale, multiple_choice, yes_no, text_input, ranking, rating, matrix]
Missing scale reference: scale_id required for likert_scale and rating question types
Missing response options: response_options array required for multiple_choice questions
Invalid character limit: Must be between 10 and 2000 for text_input questions
Insufficient options: multiple_choice questions need at least 2 response options
Too many options: Maximum 15 response options allowed for optimal display
usage: Provide question_text, question_type, and category. For scaled questions, include scale_id. For multiple choice, provide response_options array. Set is_required, help_text, character_limit, and randomize_options as needed.

question_id.description: Unique identifier for the built question

question_object.description: Complete question configuration as JSON string

validation_rules.description: Applied validation rules for this question

estimated_response_time.description: Estimated seconds to answer this question
